text: Ni vashi rodstvenniki, ni vashi deti (ostavshiyesya v Mekke), kotorykh vy vzyali druz'yami, a oni - vragi Allakha i vashi vragi, ne pomogut vam. V Den' voskreseniya Allakh rassudit mezhdu vami i vvergnet Svoikh vragov v adskiy ogon', a predavshikhsya Yemu vvedot v ray. On vidit vso, chto vy vershite
